title: Create File with Rust Standard Library
description: In this lab, we have a create function that opens a file in write-only mode. It either creates a new file or destroys the old content if the file already exists. The function uses Rust's standard library to handle file operations. The example provided demonstrates how to use the create function to write the contents of a static LOREM_IPSUM string to a file named 'lorem_ipsum.txt'. The output shows a successful write operation confirmation, and the contents of the file are displayed using the cat command.
